import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem reverse_triangle_inequalities (a b : ℝ) :
    abs (a - b) ≥ abs (abs a - abs b) ∧ abs (a + b) ≥ abs (abs a - abs b) := by sorry

proof_steps.natural_language:
We assume:
• a and b are any two real numbers [tc_1]
• For any two real numbers x and y, |x+y| ≤ |x|+|y| [def_1]
Therefore, we conclude:
• |a| ≤ |a-b|+|b| [l1].
proof_steps.lean_tactics:
constructor
  · have l1 : abs a ≤ abs (a - b) + abs b := by
      rw [← sub_add_cancel a b]
      exact abs_add (a - b) b
    have l2 : abs b ≤ abs (a - b) + abs a := by
      rw [abs_sub_comm a b, ← sub_add_cancel b a]
      exact abs_add (b - a) a
    rw [ge_iff_le]
    apply abs_le_of_sub_le_and_sub_le
    · linarith [l1]
    · linarith [l2]

import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem reverse_triangle_inequalities (a b : ℝ) :
    abs (a - b) ≥ abs (abs a - abs b) ∧ abs (a + b) ≥ abs (abs a - abs b) := by
  constructor
  · have l1 : abs a ≤ abs (a - b) + abs b := by
      rw [← sub_add_cancel a b]
      exact abs_add (a - b) b
    have l2 : abs b ≤ abs (a - b) + abs a := by
      rw [abs_sub_comm a b, ← sub_add_cancel b a]
      exact abs_add (b - a) a
